entry.title: Valentine Blush Roses with greens - Hatbox
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 325.00 - 775.00 (12 variants)

A stunning mix of fuchsia, pink, and purple blush roses with lush green fillers in a chic hatbox—perfect for celebrating love this Valentine’s Day.

Standard-12 roses
Large-18 roses
Extra Large- 24 roses

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloon 1pc
* with Box of Chocolates 6pcs
* with Teddy

Please note:
* Our video preview service is not available from the 12th to the 15th February.
** Our Timing services are not available from 13th to 15th of February but we aim to have Valentine orders delivered before 16:00.
